text: He da'uda! Amara tomake prthibite khalipha baniyechi, sejan'ya tumi lokajanera madhye bicara karo n'yayasangatabhabe, ara kheyalakhusira anusarana karo na, pache ta tomake allah‌ra patha theke bhrasta kare phele. Nihsandeha yara allah‌ra patha theke bipathe yaya tadera jan'ya rayeche kathora sasti. Kenana tara bhule giyechila hiseba-nikesera dinera katha.’’
